page.title: 04Old School
page.content: {Mrs Green},a retired teacher and{Mr {Dickson},a retired janitor both worked at{Gretna High School}.{Mrs Green}has lived in Gretna since she was nine months old.When{Mrs Green}first taught in Gretna the school catered for primary and secondary pupils who came from{Kirkpatrick},{Rigg},{Mossband } and{Gretna}.There were approximately 350 pupils in the school. {Mr Dickson} didn't live in Gretna until he was in his teens.The old school had coal fires which he attended to every day.The corridors were usually dark because the small windows didn't let in much light.The classrooms had two large windows and wooden floors.There were monkeybars in the playground.The{ {old school}was fully demolished in{ {1981}.
